profile.profileDescription: Custom profile configuration for the Sterling Morton Libary at The Morton Arboretum. Note for DACS: Make sure to set "ca_objects_x_collections_hierarchy_enabled" and "ca_collections_show_add_child_control_in_inspector" to 1 in /app/conf/app.conf

label.name_singular: To be carried by the Borrower
label.name_plural: To be carried by the Borrower

label.name_singular: To be carried by the Lender
label.name_plural: To be carried by the Lender

label.name: Format Generations Types For Moving Images
Source of title
label.description: The source for the title, generally a published source.

label.name: Description
label.description: An account of the resource. Description may include but is not limited to: an abstract, a table of contents, a graphical representation, or a free-text account of the resource.

label.name: Languages
label.description: A language of the resource.

label.name: Date
label.description: A point or period of time associated with an event in the life cycle of the resource.

label.name: Notes
label.description: Notes regarding item

label.name: Georeference
label.description: Coordinates documenting the location of the item

label.name: Spatial coverage
label.description: The spatial or temporal topic of the resource, the spatial applicability of the resource, or the jurisdiction under which the resource is relevant. Spatial topic and spatial applicability may be a named place or a location specified by its geographic coordinates. Temporal topic may be a named period, date, or date range. A jurisdiction may be a named administrative entity or a geographic place to which the resource applies. Recommended best practice is to use a controlled vocabulary such as the Thesaurus of Geographic Names [TGN]. Where appropriate, named places or time periods can be used in preference to numeric identifiers such as sets of coordinates or date ranges.

label.name: Coverage notes
label.description: The spatial or temporal topic of the resource, the spatial applicability of the resource, or the jurisdiction under which the resource is relevant. Spatial topic and spatial applicability may be a named place or a location specified by its geographic coordinates. Temporal topic may be a named period, date, or date range. A jurisdiction may be a named administrative entity or a geographic place to which the resource applies. Recommended best practice is to use a controlled vocabulary such as the Thesaurus of Geographic Names [TGN]. Where appropriate, named places or time periods can be used in preference to numeric identifiers such as sets of coordinates or date ranges.

label.name: Format
label.description: The file format, physical medium, or dimensions of the resource.

label.name: Length
label.description: Length of object; enter in your preferred units (eg. 10cm)

label.name: Width
label.description: Width of object; enter in your preferred units (eg. 10cm)

label.name: Height
label.description: Height of object; enter in your preferred units (eg. 10cm)

label.name: Depth
label.description: depth of object; enter in your preferred units (eg. 10cm)

label.name: Weight
label.description: Weight of object; enter in your preferred units

label.name: Library of Congress subject headings
label.description: Library of Congress Subject headings describing this object. To add a new heading simply type the first few letters of the heading and choose the desired one from the displayed list of possible matches.

label.name: Library of Congress genre/form terms
label.description: Library of Congress Genre/Form terms describe what this object is "about." To add a new heading simply type the first few letters of the heading and choose the desired one from the displayed list of possible matches.

label.name: Rights
label.description: Information about rights held in and over the resource.

label.name: End of restriction notes
label.description: Add any notes regarding the end of restriction.

label.name: Rights holder
label.description: To identify the person or organisation holding or managing the rights related to the resource.

label.name: Copyright statement
label.description: Use to state copyright statements over the resource.

label.name: State
label.description: A description of the state of the work; used primarily for prints and other multiples.

label.name: Source of state/edition
label.description: The published source of the state or edition information.

label.name: Materials/techniques
label.description: An indication of the substances or materials used in the creation of a work, as well as any implements, production or manufacturing techniques, processes, or methods incorporated in its fabrication, presented in a syntax suitable for display to the end-user and including any necessary indications of uncertainty, ambiguity, and nuance.

label.name: Style
label.description: Term that identifies the named, defined style, historical or artistic period, movement, group, or school whose characteristics are represented in the work being catalogued.

label.name: Culture
label.description: Name of the culture, people, or nationality from which the work originated.

label.name: Inscriptions
label.description: A description or transcription of any distinguishing or identifying physical lettering, annotations, texts, markings, or labels that are affixed, applied, stamped, written, inscribed, or attached to the work, excluding any mark or text inherent in the materials of which the work is made (record watermarks in Display Materials/Techniques).

label.name: Type
label.description: The type of drawing.

label.name: Type
label.description: The type of print.

label.name: Time start
label.description: The descriptor formatTimeStart provides a time stamp for the beginning point of playback for a time-based media item, such as digital video or audio. Use in combination with formatDuration to identify a sequence or segment of a media item that has a fixed start time and end time.

label.name: Duration
label.description: The descriptor formatDuration provides a timestamp for the overall length or duration of a time-based media item. It represents the playback time.

label.name: Data rate
label.description: The amount of data in a digital media file that is encoded, delivered or distributed, for every second of time. Although optimal data rates are often dependent on the codec used to compress and encode a digital file, a larger data rate translates into a better quality playback experience. Different components of an asset may have their own data rates and when combined report a total data rate. This metadata element can accommodate any of these specifications.

label.name: Colors
label.description: The descriptor formatColors indicates the overall color, grayscale, or black and white nature of a media item, as a single occurrence or combination of occurrences in or throughout the media item.

label.name: Tracks
label.description: The descriptor formatTracks is simply intended to indicate the number and type of tracks that are found in a media item, whether it is analog or digital. Other configuration information specific to these identified tracks should be described using formatChannelConfiguration.

label.name: Channel configuration
label.description: The descriptor formatChannelConfiguration is designed to indicate the arrangement or configuration of specific channels or layers of information within a media item's tracks. Examples are 2-track mono, 8 track stereo, or video track with alpha channel.

label.name: Essence track
label.description: pbcoreEssenceTrack is a sub-container of pbcoreInstatiation that enables description of technical details specific to each track in a digital media object.

label.name: Track type
label.description: (audio, video, text, etc.)

label.name: Track type
label.description: (audio, video, text, etc.)

label.name: Track identifier
label.description: the alphanumeric identifier of the track defined by a technical metadata extraction tool or other track metadata reader

label.name: Track identifier
label.description: the alphanumeric identifier of the track defined by a technical metadata extraction tool or other track metadata reader

label.name: Track identifier source
label.description: the name of the software or tool that provided the Track Identifier

label.name: Track identifier source
label.description: the name of the software or tool that provided the Track Identifier

label.name: Track standard
label.description: (NTSC, PAL, ATSC, etc.)

label.name: Track standard
label.description: (NTSC, PAL, ATSC, etc.)

label.name: Track encoding
label.description: The descriptor trackEncoding identifies how the actual information in a media item is compressed, interpreted, or formulated using a particular scheme.

label.name: Track encoding
label.description: The descriptor trackEncoding identifies how the actual information in a media item is compressed, interpreted, or formulated using a particular scheme.

label.name: Track data rate
label.description: the amount of data encoded or delivered in this track for for every second of time (8 mb/s, 1930 kb/s, etc)

label.name: Track data rate
label.description: the amount of data encoded or delivered in this track for for every second of time (8 mb/s, 1930 kb/s, etc)

label.name: Track time start
label.description: time stamp for the beginning point of playback

label.name: Track time start
label.description: time stamp for the beginning point of playback

label.name: Track duration
label.description: time stamp for the overall duration of the track

label.name: Track duration
label.description: time stamp for the overall duration of the track

label.name: Track bit depth
label.description: measurement of 'how much' data is sampled during digitization or encoding (10 bit, 16 bit, 24 bit, etc.)

label.name: Track bit depth
label.description: measurement of 'how much' data is sampled during digitization or encoding (10 bit, 16 bit, 24 bit, etc.)

label.name: Track sampling rate
label.description: for audio tracks: measurement of 'how often' data is sampled during digitization or encoding (48 kHz, 96 kHz, etc.)

label.name: Track sampling rate
label.description: for audio tracks: measurement of 'how often' data is sampled during digitization or encoding (48 kHz, 96 kHz, etc.)

label.name: Track frame size
label.description: for still and moving image tracks: dimensions of the video image, expressed as horizontal by vertical pixels (640x480, 1920x1080, etc.)

label.name: Track frame size
label.description: for still and moving image tracks: dimensions of the video image, expressed as horizontal by vertical pixels (640x480, 1920x1080, etc.)

label.name: Track aspect ratio
label.description: for still or moving image tracks: the ratio of horizontal to vertical proportions in the display of a static or moving image (4:3, 16:9, etc.)

label.name: Track aspect ratio
label.description: for still or moving image tracks: the ratio of horizontal to vertical proportions in the display of a static or moving image (4:3, 16:9, etc.)

label.name: Track frame rate
label.description: for moving image tracks: frames per second of moving image display (24 fps, 29.97 fps, etc.)

label.name: Track frame rate
label.description: for moving image tracks: frames per second of moving image display (24 fps, 29.97 fps, etc.)

label.name: Track language
label.description: for audio or text tracks: the primary language of the track

label.name: Track language
label.description: for audio or text tracks: the primary language of the track

label.name: Track annotation
label.description: any supplementary information about a track.

label.name: Track annotation
label.description: any supplementary information about a track.

label.name: Biography
label.description: Narrative biography for entity. This is the primary text used to document the entity.

label.name: Source of biography
label.description: Source of entity biography. This should be a formal citation if possible. For informal sources a narrative description is acceptable.

label.name: Nationality
label.description: National or cultural affiliation of the person or corporate body.

label.name: Vital dates
label.description: A description of the lifespan of the person or the existence of the corporate body, using ca. and any other expressions of uncertainty or nuance. For Birth and Death date attributes, record years of birth and death, estimated where necessary. For a corporate body, use birthdate and deathdate to record the dates of founding and dissolution.

label.name: Vital dates
label.description: A description of the lifespan of the person or the existence of the corporate body, using ca. and any other expressions of uncertainty or nuance. For Birth and Death date attributes, record years of birth and death, estimated where necessary. For a corporate body, use birthdate and deathdate to record the dates of founding and dissolution.

label.name: Gender
label.description: The sex of the individual. Not applicable for corporate bodies.

label.name: Role
label.description: The role played by the creator or other agent in the creation or production of the work.

label.name: Repository
label.description: This element identifies the name and location of the repository that hold the materials being described.

label.name: Extent
label.description: This element indicates the extent and the physical nature of the materials being described.

label.name: Administrative/biographical history element
label.description: A description of the context in which the materials being described were created, assembled, and/or maintained is as important as the description of the materials themselves

label.name: Custodial history
label.description: This element provides information on changes of ownership or custody of the material being described, from the time it left the possession of the creator until it was acquired by the repository, that is significant for its authenticity, integrity, and interpretation.

label.name: Immediate source of acquisition
label.description: This element identifies the source from which the repository directly acquired the materials being described, as well as the date of acquisition, the method of acquisition, and other relevant information.

label.name: Appraisal, destruction, and scheduling information
label.description: This element provides information about the rationale for appraisal decisions, destruction actions, and disposition schedules that are relevant to the understanding and use of the materials being described.

label.name: Accruals
label.description: This element informs the user of anticipated additions to the unit being described. An accrual is an acquisition of archival materials additional to that already in the custody of the repository.

label.name: Scope and content
label.description: This element provides information about the nature of the materials and activities reflected in the unit being described to enable users to judge its potential relevance.

label.name: System of arrangement
label.description: This element identifies the various aggregations of archival materials, their relationships, or the sequence of documents within them.

label.name: Conditions governing access
label.description: This element provides information about access restrictions due to the nature of the information in the materials being described, such as those imposed by the donor, by the repository, or by statutory/regulatory requirements.

label.name: Physical access
label.description: This element provides information about access restrictions due to any physical characteristics or storage locations that limit, restrict, delay, or otherwise affect access to the materials being described.

label.name: Technical access
label.description: This element provides information about access restrictions due to any technical requirements restrict or otherwise affect access to the materials being described, such as equipment or specific hardware/software required for use.

label.name: Conditions governing reproduction
label.description: This element identifies any restrictions on reproduction due to copyright or other reasons, as well as restrictions on further use of the materials being described, such as publication after access has been provided.

label.name: Languages and scripts on the material
label.description: This element identifies the language(s), script(s), and symbol systems employed in the materials being described, particularly as they may affect its use.

label.name: Other finding aids
label.description: This element identifies any other finding aids to the materials being described particularly if they are available to the user, and provides information about the form and content of those finding aids.

label.name: Existence and location of originals
label.description: This element indicates the existence, location, and availability of originals when the materials being described consist of copies, and the originals are not held by the repository

label.name: Existence and location of copies
label.description: This element indicates the existence, location, and availability of copies or other reproductions of the materials being described when they are available for use in an institution, or for loan or purchase, or available electronically. Do not mention copies in private hands or copies made for personal use.

label.name: Related archival materials
label.description: This element indicates the existence and location of archival materials that are closely related to the materials being described by provenance, sphere of activity, or subject matter, either in the same repository, in other repositories, or elseware.

label.name: Publication note
label.description: This element identifies any publications that are about or are based on the use, study, or analysis of the materials being described.

label.name: Event type
label.description: Enter the type of the event.

label.name: Authorization date
label.description: The date when the loan was authorized.

label.name: Loan in date
label.description: The date a loan will enter the institution.

label.name: Loan out date
label.description: The date a loan will enter the institution.

label.name: Loan return date
label.description: The date a loan is due back to the lending institution.

label.name: Loan conditions
label.description: A statement of the conditions on a loan.

label.name: Loan notes
label.description: General information about the loan.

label.name: Loan purpose
label.description: General information about the purpose of loan.

label.name: Appeared In
label.description: A description or transcription of any distinguishing or identifying physical lettering, annotations, texts, markings, or labels that are affixed, applied, stamped, written, inscribed, or attached to the work, excluding any mark or text inherent in the materials of which the work is made (record watermarks in Display Materials/Techniques).

label.name: Additional notes
label.description: Additional Notes regarding the accession of this item.
